Name: GORUFOO
About the game: Welcome to the Fantasy Sport GORUFOO! Dodge traps, sink the ball, collect XP to lower your score in this wacky world of fantasy sport GORUFOO. Early Access Release version includes: - Main game mode 'Score Attack' (Balancing and rulesets may change as updates come) 'Score Attack' mode - The main objective of the game is to sink the ball. Score as many holes as you can in the provided time span. Simple as it gets! - As you score, the arena provides the player with the opportunity to up the stakes and prolong the game time - Additional rules and hazards are planned to be implemented as development goes
